TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi MediaElement extends System.Windows.FrameworkElement implements class System.Windows.Markup.IUriContext
Public Class MediaElement Inherits FrameworkElement Implements IUriContext
public ref class MediaElement : System::Windows::FrameworkElement, System::Windows::Markup::IUriContext
type MediaElement = class inherit FrameworkElement interface IUriContext

summary.span: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.

span.span: Represents a control that contains audio and/or video.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在隨著您的應用程式散發媒體時，您無法使用媒體檔案做為專案資源。When distributing media with your application, you cannot use a media file as a project resource. 在您的專案檔中，您必須改為將媒體類型設定為 `Content`，並將 `CopyToOutputDirectory` 設定為 `PreserveNewest` 或 `Always`。In your project file, you must instead set the media type to `Content` and set `CopyToOutputDirectory` to `PreserveNewest` or `Always`. 可用於兩個不同的模式，根據推動控制項： 獨立模式或時鐘模式。 can be used in two different modes, depending on what is driving the control: independent mode or clock mode. 在獨立模式中，使用時類似影像和[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)]可以直接指定。When used in the independent mode, the is analogous to an image, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] can be directly specified. 時脈模式可以視為動畫的目標，因此會有對應和時間樹狀結構中的項目。In clock mode, the can be thought of as a target for an animation, and thus it will have corresponding and entries in the timing tree. 如需有關媒體模式的詳細資訊，請參閱[多媒體概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md)。For more information on media modes, see the [Multimedia Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/multimedia-overview.md). 如需控制在獨立模式中，請參閱[如何： 控制 （播放、 暫停、 停止、 磁碟區和速度） 至 MediaElement](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md)。For an example of controlling a in independent mode, see [How to: Control a MediaElement (Play, Pause, Stop, Volume, and Speed)](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/how-to-control-a-mediaelement-play-pause-stop-volume-and-speed.md). 直到已經引發事件，和的控制項將會報告為零當媒體內容用來判斷最終大小，以及控制項的位置。Until the event has been raised, the and of the control will report as zero as the media content is used to determine the final size and location of the control. 對於音訊僅內容，這些屬性一律為零。For audio only content, these properties will always be zero. 固定的大小的控制項，及/或可以設定屬性。For a fixed size control, the and/or properties can be set. 不過，若要保留媒體的長寬比，設定或屬性，但非兩者。However, to preserve the media's aspect ratio, set the or properties but not both.

The default is 0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks -1 值代表的左半部喇叭的 100%，1 代表 100%的右端喇叭。A value of -1 represents 100% of the left side speakers and 1 represents 100% of the right side speakers. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性將媒體項目放入模式，它會利用時間引擎。Setting this property puts the media element into a mode in which it utilizes the timing engine. 停止任何先前已播放的媒體和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)]相關聯的新時鐘已開啟。Any media that was previously playing is stopped and the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_uri](~/includes/tlasharptla-uri-md.md)] associated with the new clock is opened.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Pause() cil managed

summary.span: Pauses media at the current position.

span.span: Pauses media at the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果媒體目前正在執行，則這個方法會暫停媒體。This method pauses the media if the media is currently running. 方法可以用來繼續。The method can be used to resume. 使用此方法時，才屬性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，時間引擎控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 這個方法沒有效果才屬性設定為。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Play() cil managed

summary.span: Plays media from the current position.

span.span: Plays media from the current position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法將會開始在媒體，如果不是目前作用中，或繼續已暫停的媒體。This method will begin the media if it is not currently active or resume media if it is paused. 如果媒體目前正在執行，這個方法沒有任何作用。This method has no effect if the media is currently running. 使用此方法時，才屬性是`null`。This method can be used only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，時間引擎控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 這個方法沒有效果才屬性設定為。This method has an effect only if the property is set to .

span.span: The property is not .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property TimeSpan Position { TimeSpan get(); void set(TimeSpan value); };
member this.Position : TimeSpan with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

span.span: Gets or sets the current position of progress through the media's playback time.

value.span: 自媒體開始播放後的時間量。

span.span: The amount of time since the beginning of the media.
The default is 00:00:00.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性可以讓您跳到播放 （也稱為搜尋） 在不同時間點。Setting this property can enable you to jump to different points in playback (also known as seeking). 並非所有的媒體類型可讓搜尋作業。Not all media types allow seek operations. 如果媒體來源不允許搜尋，就會引發事件。The event will fire if the media source does not allow seeking. 這個屬性就沒有作用直到之後已發生事件。This property has no effect until after the event has occurred. 這個屬性可以設定只有當屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，時間引擎控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior.

span.span: The property is not .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the will update frames for seek operations while paused.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the will update frames for seek operations while paused.

value.span: 如果暫停; 時，會更新畫面格否則， 。

span.span: if frames are updated while paused; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當設定為`false`、 搜尋至特定位置就只會更新顯示的畫面格，如果正在播放媒體。When set to `false`, seeking to a specific location will only update the displayed frame if media is playing. 設定至`true`會造成降低效能，尤其是當以互動方式控制播放媒體。Setting to `true` can incur some performance costs, especially when interactively controlling media playback. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None|

summary.span: Gets or sets a media source on the .

span.span: Gets or sets a media source on the .
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uri](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uri-md.md)] that specifies the source of the element.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性的值會導致要播放的媒體。Setting the value of this property causes the media to play. 這個屬性可以設定只有當屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，時間引擎控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , |

MemberSignature.Value: public: property double SpeedRatio { double get(); void set(double value); };
member this.SpeedRatio : double with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.

span.span: Gets or sets the speed ratio of the media.
The speed ratio of the media.

value.span: 有效範圍介於 0 (零) 與無限大之間。

span.span: The valid range is between 0 (zero) and infinity.

value.span: 小於 1 的值會產生比正常播放還要慢的速度，而大於 1 的值則會產生比正常播放還要快的速度。

span.span: Values less than 1 yield slower than normal playback, and values greater than 1 yield faster than normal playback.
Negative values are treated as 0.
The default value is 1.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性可以設定只有當屬性是`null`。This property can be set only when the property is `null`. 當屬性為非`null`，時間引擎控制媒體播放行為。When the property is non-`null`, the timing engine controls media playback behavior. 音訊播放未出現，除非值為 1。Audio playback may not occur unless the value of is 1.

span.span: The property is not .

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that describes how a fills the destination rectangle.

The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 下圖示範不同值。The following illustration demonstrates the different values. ![不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "不同的 TileBrush Stretch 設定")![Different TileBrush Stretch settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-stretchenum.jpg "Different TileBrush Stretch settings") 不同的漸層擴展方法Different gradient spread methods ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |中繼資料屬性設定為 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立並設定模式的內容。The following example shows how to create a and set the mode of content. [!code-cpp[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/CPP/ViewboxCode.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/Csharp/ViewboxCode.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ViewBoxCode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ViewBoxCode/VisualBasic/ViewBoxCodeVB.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Controls::StretchDirection StretchDirection { System::Windows::Controls::StretchDirection get(); void set(System::Windows::Controls::StretchDirection value); };
member this.StretchDirection : System.Windows.Controls.StretchDirection with get, set

summary.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the restrictions on scaling that are applied to the image.

span.span: Gets or sets a value that determines the restrictions on scaling that are applied to the image.

value.span: 值，指定方向的項目會自動縮放。

span.span: The value that specifies the direction the element is stretched.
The default is .
